description: Modifies an existing DB subnet group. DB subnet groups must contain at least one subnet in at least two AZs in the Amazon Region.

parameters.name: DBSubnetGroupName
parameters.description: The name for the DB subnet group. This value is stored as a lowercase string. You can't modify the default subnet group. Constraints: Must match the name of an existing DBSubnetGroup. Must not be default. Example: mySubnetgroup.

parameters.name: SubnetIds
parameters.description: The EC2 subnet IDs for the DB subnet group. (string) ---

nested_items.name: DBSubnetGroup
nested_items.description: Contains the details of an Amazon Neptune DB subnet group.

nested_items.name: DBSubnetGroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the DB subnet group.

nested_items.name: DBSubnetGroupDescription
nested_items.description: Provides the description of the DB subnet group.

nested_items.name: VpcId
nested_items.description: Provides the VpcId of the DB subnet group.

nested_items.name: SubnetGroupStatus
nested_items.description: Provides the status of the DB subnet group.

nested_items.name: Subnets
nested_items.description: Contains a list of  Subnet elements.

nested_items.name: SubnetIdentifier
nested_items.description: Specifies the identifier of the subnet.

nested_items.name: SubnetAvailabilityZone
nested_items.description: Specifies the EC2 Availability Zone that the subnet is in.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the availability zone.

nested_items.name: SubnetStatus
nested_items.description: Specifies the status of the subnet.

nested_items.name: DBSubnetGroupArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the DB subnet group.
